parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per test per specimen per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: OMSEQ

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89977

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in OMTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in OMTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). OMTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
datasetVariables.label: Test Short Name
datasetVariables.name: OMTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89976

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for OMTESTCD. The value in OMTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters.
datasetVariables.label: Test Name
datasetVariables.name: OMTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the measurement or finding as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: OMORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMORRESU

datasetVariables.description: The unit for the original result. The unit of the original result should be mapped to a synonymous unit on the Controlled Terminology (http://www.cdisc.org/terminology) list.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Original Result
datasetVariables.name: OMORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from OMORRES in a standard format or in standard units. OMSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be submitted in numeric format in OMSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: OMSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for numeric results or findings in standard format; contains the numeric form of OMSTRESC. OMSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Numeric Format
datasetVariables.name: OMSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for OMSTRESC and OMSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Standardized Result
datasetVariables.name: OMSTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate when a test is not done or result is missing. Should be null if a result exists in OMORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: OMSTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why OMSTAT is NOT DONE, such as BROKEN EQUIPMENT or TECHNICIAN OVERSIGHT.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: OMREASND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C77529

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSPEC

datasetVariables.description: Defines the type of tissue, organ, or fluid specimen used as the object for the finding. Examples: GLAND, ADRENAL, KIDNEY, VESSEL, LYMPHATIC.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Material Type
datasetVariables.name: OMSPEC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMANTREG

datasetVariables.description: Defines the specific anatomical or biological region of a tissue, organ specimen, or the region from which the specimen was obtained, such as a section or part of what is defined in the OMSPEC variable. If the anatomical region is not included in the specimen description OMSPEC, it may be included in this variable. This field can be a combination of terms where needed. This field can be blank if not applicable. Examples: CORTEX, MEDULLA, MUCOSA, SEROSA, ISLET, ZONA FASICULATA, ZONA RETICULARIS, CRANIAL, MEDIAN, ACCESSORY, SPINAL, LUMBAR, FRONTAL.
datasetVariables.label: Anatomical Region of Specimen
datasetVariables.name: OMANTREG

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSPCCND

datasetVariables.description: Free or standardized text describing the condition of the specimen. Example: FIXED.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Condition
datasetVariables.name: OMSPCCND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMSPCUFL

datasetVariables.description: Describes the usability of the specimen for the test. Should be "N" if the specimen is not usable; otherwise it should be null.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Usability for the Test
datasetVariables.name: OMSPCUFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99073

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMLAT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for laterality of the specimen within the subject for paired specimens. Examples: LEFT, RIGHT, BILATERAL.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Laterality within Subject
datasetVariables.name: OMLAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99074

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMDIR

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for directionality of the specimen within the subject. Examples: DORSAL, PROXIMAL.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Directionality within Subject
datasetVariables.name: OMDIR

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99075

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMPORTOT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location or specimen further detailing the portion or totality, which means arrangement of, or apportioning of. Examples: ENTIRE, SINGLE, SEGMENT, MANY.
datasetVariables.label: Portion or Totality
datasetVariables.name: OMPORTOT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMEXCLFL

datasetVariables.description: "Y" if the result should be excluded from all calculations, otherwise null.
datasetVariables.label: Exclusion Flag
datasetVariables.name: OMEXCLFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMREASEX

datasetVariables.description: The reason the result should be excluded from all calculations. Used only when OMEXCLFL is "Y".
datasetVariables.label: Reason for Exclusion
datasetVariables.name: OMREASEX

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/Time of specimen/tissue weighing, in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time Organ Measured
datasetVariables.name: OMDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of specimen/tissue weighing, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Measurement
datasetVariables.name: OMDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMNOMDY

datasetVariables.description: Nominal study day: Used for grouping records for observations that may occur on different days into a single reported study day. Should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Nominal Study Day for Tabulations
datasetVariables.name: OMNOMDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable OM.OMNOMLBL

datasetVariables.description: A label for a given value of OMNOMDY as presented in the study report (examples: "Week 4," "Day 28," "Terminal Sac").
datasetVariables.label: Label for Nominal Study Day
datasetVariables.name: OMNOMLBL

description: Findings from organ measurement evaluations. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C49605, 2018-06-29)
label: Organ Measurements
name: OM
